newsitem.title: GERMANY: Deutsche - no interest in insurer Victoria.
newsitem.headline: Deutsche - no interest in insurer Victoria.

text.p: Germany's largest bank, Deutsche Bank AG on Tuesday denied rumours in a German newsletter that it was interested in taking over a stake in insurer Victoria Holding.

A Deutsche Bank spokesman told Reuters that it had no interest in taking over Victoria. The denial came after a report in the Platow Brief newsletter, which said Victoria was ripe for takeover and named Deutsche Bank as a possible suitor.

German reinsurance group Muenchner Rueck AG said it planned to hold on to its 18.3 percent stake in Victoria Holding, while Swiss insurer Zurich Insurance declined comment on reports that it was also interested in buying Victoria.
A spokesman for Victoria said he knew nothing of any attempted takeover by Zurich Insurance.
